original_title: Once in a Lifetime: A Russian Song for Guiuan
overview: In a sentimental journey back to the place where he once found safe haven as a 10-year old orphan refugee, international recognized Russian folk singer Nikolai Massenkoff gives a "Thank You Philippines" concert in Guiuan, Samar after Typhoon Yolanda devastated the province.
title: Once in a Lifetime: A Russian Song for Guiuan
